alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Ynez Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Santa Barbara County through 615 AM PST... At 600 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Solvang, or near Santa Ynez, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Ynez... Solvang... and Buellton. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Ynez Valley
